snippet: A man from Pakistan who was a permanent resident of Canada told an undercover officer that he planned to bomb the United States Consulate or the financial district in Toronto, an immigration panel revealed on Wednesday.
abstract: Pakistani and permanent Canadian resident Jahanzeb Malik tells undercover officer that he plans to bomb either United States consulate or financial district in Toronto, Canada; government calls for his deportation.
lead_paragraph: A man from Pakistan who was a permanent resident of Canada told an undercover officer that he planned to bomb the United States Consulate or the financial district in Toronto, an immigration panel revealed on Wednesday.

headline.main: Canada: U.S. Consulate Attack Was Foiled, Panel Says
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: U.S. Consulate Attack Was Foiled, Panel Says
